articles.description: Citybuilder Workers & Resources: Soviet Republic has been removed from Steam due to what its developers allege is a malicious DMCA filed by a disgrunted player.
articles.content: Workers & Resources: Soviet Republic is a citybuilder about wrangling supply chains and logistics. Sin is a big fan. Unfortunately the supply of the game itself from Steam has been halted, and it… [+2765 chars]
